Name: Danger! Explosive!
Description: On the hillside, Exile Yongli is surrounded by Explosive Charges. You detonated all of the charges out of impulse. Go listen to what he has to say.
QuestDesc: On the hillside, Exile Yongli is surrounded by Explosive Charges. You detonated all of the charges out of impulse. Go listen to what he has to say.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The Explosive Charges I had before all got stolen by the other camps. I finally managed to collect these, and now...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: My future life depended on those thirty Explosive Charges!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh* Forget it, I might as well just suck it up. It's not like I spent hours collecting them or anything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: With Explosive Charges, my buddies and I can blast open that rock formation under the hill.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The minerals inside should be enough to pay for my medical bills in the city...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ah! I've said too much... Why did I even tell you that?!

Options.PlotLineKey: How about I go collect some for you?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: R-really? That's great! Thank you!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here's some heads up for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Explosive Charges that are freshly picked tend to be very unstable. Even the slightest amount of vibration or change in temperature can cause them to explode.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me and my buddies went through a ton of effort processing and stabilizing those we had earlier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You definitely won't make it in time if you go pick them up now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, the Exile camps nearby should have plenty of charges stocked up, some of them might even be ours.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can try out your luck around those camps.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Easy for you to say. Thirty Explosive Charges! Where in hell am I supposed to get all of 'em...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Haha. Do you want to do the honors?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You looked like you knew your explosives well back there.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, well, well. What do we have here? Looks like we got here just in time. The minerals are open for the taking.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: We appreciate you for blowing up the rocks for us.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Oh, no you don't! You got away with our Explosive Charges, we're not letting you...

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Just shut yer trap. In this day and age, winner takes all. Get 'em!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wow. I can't believe you really came back with thirty of them!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Great. Now we can proceed with our plans according to schedule.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Say, you must've got a few tricks of your own if you managed to get those charges so fast. Why do you join us in our plan?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: If we can't get it done before nighttime, the other camps will definitely try to come seize the minerals. We could use the extra hand guarding the mining site.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You help us guard the minerals, and we give you part of the cut. How does that sound?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perfect. I need to split the Explosive Charge for my buddies. Wanna come with me?

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You don't wanna miss the fireworks!

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where did you come from? You... You got here because of the aroma, didn't you?

Options.PlotLineKey: I came here for the Explosive Charges.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It's a new recipe I just came up with, using Explosive Charges as one of the ingredients â€” Bomblicious.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And I know what you're thinking. Explosive Charges for cooking aren't the most popular choice, especially with the added risks.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: But by correctly combining the properties of different ingredients with it, you'll be in for a treat of your lifetime.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm still missing a few key ingredients. Do you think you can help me get some?

Options.PlotLineKey: Sure. But I want something in return.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: What is it?

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How did you know I had so many charges...? Ugh. Never mind...

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You get me the rest of my ingredients, I complete my recipe, and the rest of the Explosive Charges are all yours.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I risked my life getting these out, can't let them go to waste.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Back to the chase. I still need Chromeshells, Perillas, and Gloom Sloughs. Three of each. You think you can get them for me?

Options.PlotLineKey: That's a lot of work. I think I'll pass.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: All right. I'll be right here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well? Do we have a deal?

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Get me Chromeshells, Perillas, and Gloom Sloughs, three of each, and I'll spare some of my Explosive Charges for you.

Options.PlotLineKey: What do you need these ingredients for?
That's a lot of work. I think I'll pass.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Chromeshells are for balancing out the Explosive Charge's heat properties.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Perillas are used for enhancing flavors.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And Gloom Sloughs for containing any explosive reactions.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You'll find all three ingredients in the Dim Forest.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Off you go then. I'll be right here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Off you go then. I'll be right here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Okay then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Very nice. Didn't expect you to them this fast.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Now, time for the magic to happen. Just wait.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Consider this your lucky day, my friend. Not many people have the opportunity to taste such delicacy you know.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Go ahead. Take a mouthful.

Options.PlotLineKey: Is it... supposed to be in flames like that...?

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Exactly. That's when you know you're having authentic "Bomblicious."

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Suit yourself. I'll enjoy it all to myself then.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Mmmhmm... The aroma... The wonderful texture... Ohhh...

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well? What do you think?

Options.PlotLineKey: It's unlike anything I've ever tasted before.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I knew it. No one can resist the spurring sensation.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Huh? Wait, your nose... You have smoke coming out of your nose...

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Yes... That's the Explosive Charges doing their work. I can confidently say the new recipe is a success.

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This recipe wouldn't have happened without you. As promised, the rest of my Explosive Charges are yours.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Sounds like that Feng has a lot of Explosive Charges on him.

Dialogues.Speaker: Speaker_83
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The ones in this camp don't seem quite enough for Yongli. I should go find Feng once I'm done here.

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Supply Manager
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Uhh... B-Boss... I was going over our supplies, and we're missing some of the Explosive Charges we hauled a couple of days ago. Like ten or so...

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You say how many??!! Are you trying to make me end you? You had one job!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Supply Manager
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Wait! Boss!! I-I... I tracked down the one who did it!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Supply Manager
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: It was that little brat Feng!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Supply Manager
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: The guys told me the kid's been mumbling about some rare cooking ingredient, ever since he laid eyes on those charges. Said he wanted to cook with them or something...

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Supply Manager
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: They last saw him heading towards these coordinates!

Dialogues.Speaker: Exile Leader
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You idiot! Does that tiny brain of yours have any idea how much money those charges can make us? Get after them! NOW!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Phew. Good thing we had you on our side, or else they would've gotten away with it again...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Here's your cut of the minerals. We keep our word!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: And this box we blew out of the rocks... Take it with you as well! We wouldn't have had these minerals without you to begin with!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Glad you decided to help out today. Now with these minerals, I can finally...

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh* It's too early to say for sure. Don't wanna jinx it. Until we meet again!

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: *sigh* Forget it, I might as well just suck it up. It's not like I spent hours collecting them or anything.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You wanna help me get some Explosive Charges? Ain't much, only thirty will do.

Options.PlotLineKey: I'll go get them for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Awesome! That's wonderful.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Let me give some heads up first.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Explosive Charges that are freshly picked tend to be very unstable. Even the slightest amount of vibration or change in temperature can cause them to explode.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Me and my buddies went through a ton of effort processing and stabilizing those we had earlier.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You definitely won't make it in time if you go pick them up now.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: However, the Exile camps nearby should have plenty of charges stocked up, some of them might even be ours.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: You can try out your luck around those camps.

Dialogues.Speaker: Yongli
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Where in hell am I supposed to get all of 'em...

Dialogues.Speaker: Feng
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hey. No touching my precious ingredients!
